about_the_game:
Recover the lost eagles

Experience a new Citadelum campaign, accompanying General Germanicus and his legions in hostile territory. Fight to recover the banners lost after the battle of Teutoburg and restore honor to the empire.

Build and fight in a new biome

Cross the forests and swamps of Germania. Build your cities on the border with the barbarian peoples and establish Rome's dominion on the farthest frontier of the empire. Discover three new maps with new geographical features.

Rome's greatest challenge

The Lost Eagles of Germania additional content is designed to test your strategic skills with limited resources, numerous enemies and territories from which only the most skilled governors will be able to emerge victorious.
